div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/RelatedArtifact|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 ComplexType `RelatedArtifact` is representable via FHIR R4 extensions. Element `RelatedArtifact` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RelatedArtifact`, but has no comparisons.
Element `RelatedArtifact.type` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RelatedArtifact.type`, but has no comparisons.
Element `RelatedArtifact.classifier` has a context of RelatedArtifact based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `RelatedArtifact`.
Element `RelatedArtifact.label` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RelatedArtifact.label`, but has no comparisons.
Element `RelatedArtifact.display` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RelatedArtifact.display`, but has no comparisons.
Element `RelatedArtifact.citation` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RelatedArtifact.citation`, but has no comparisons.
Element `RelatedArtifact.document` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RelatedArtifact.document`, but has no comparisons.
Element `RelatedArtifact.resource` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RelatedArtifact.resource`, but has no comparisons.

Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `RelatedArtifact.resourceReference` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `RelatedArtifact.resourceReference` has a context of RelatedArtifact based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `RelatedArtifact`.
Element `RelatedArtifact.publicationStatus` has a context of RelatedArtifact based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `RelatedArtifact`.
Element `RelatedArtifact.publicationDate` has a context of RelatedArtifact based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `RelatedArtifact`.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.
